Package edu.cuny.random

Parameterizable distributions based on colt .

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
StateCopyable An interface defining an AbstractDistribution whose distribution parameters can be setup after an example object of the same type.
 

Class Summary
Beta A parameterizable beta distribution.
Binomial A parameterizable binomial distribution.
BreitWigner A parameterizable Breit-Wigner distribution.
ChiSquare A parameterizable chi-square distribution.
CombiDistribution A distribution that combines several different distributions.
DiscreteProbabilityDistribution A class representing a discrete probability distribution which can used to generate random events according to the specified distribution.
Exponential A parameterizable exponential distribution.
ExponentialPower A parameterizable exponential power distribution.
Gamma A parameterizable gamma distribution.
Hyperbolic A parameterizable Hyperbolic distribution.
HyperGeometric A parameterizable hypergeometric distribution.
Logarithmic A parameterizable logarithmic distribution.
NegativeBinomial A parameterizable negative binomial distribution.
Normal A parameterizable normal distribution.
ParallelCombiDistribution A distribution whose probability function is the average of those of several sub-distributions.
Poisson A parameterizable Poisson distribution.
StudentT A parameterizable Student's t-distribution.
Uniform A parameterizable uniform distribution.
VonMises A parameterizable von Mises distribution.
Zeta A parameterizable zeta distribution.
 

Error Summary
DiscreteProbabilityDistribution.ProbabilityError  
 

Package edu.cuny.random Description

Parameterizable distributions based on colt .
